title: How to make a PBE account without access to email?
body: So, I lost access to my Email which I forgot my password to, can anybody help me about with this?

replies.body:
You can both check the status of your PBE application and create one (if you've been accepted) on the [PBE Application page.](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)

Let me know if this answered your question.

i've applied so many times for PBE but never got accepted. why not ;(
Dude, I can't even apply, cause i live in Australia

I got *mad love* for my OCE friends, and I know some of them have smurfs on other regions and have been invited to the PBE on that account. If you're really interested in the PBE, maybe you can try that, and maybe even on NA. :D

The criteria for how we select PBE testers changes fairly often. Most often, though, we select players who are very active, are a positive influence on the community and would provide very good feedback. Sometimes what we're looking to test will also prompt a batch of invites to specific players who could provide great insight on that feature or change. For example, if we were looking to rework Taric, we could find some of the most active Taric mains and send them an invite.

Full details are outlined in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if this cleared it up for you.
